summary:
Let\'s Remove Limits for immunity ...
----------------------------------------------------
How About Werewolf & Vampire Hybrid aye ?
descriptionHtml:
As far we all remember
--------------------------------------
Vampirism :: Porphyric Hemophilia
Had immunity to all Disease 100% now we have 0%

Werewolf :: Lycanthropy 
Had immunity to all Disease 100% now we have 0%

----------------------------
Yes yes it\'s true now we can become hybrid mixed beast i will be glad to see pictures how you succeed with mod turned in one because i had difficulty to test it fully but i think it will work like it should .

----------------------------

I have issues what to do ?
----------------------------
Report report and report them to fix them as soon is possible .

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Having Problems or missing other mods check out my profile for more .
